lore: Mutated Crypt Bats have developed intelligence due to prolonged exposure to magic. They are also known as "windfangs" in many places because of their ability to fly at extraordinary speeds, and they are capable of tearing off large chunks of flesh from their prey before it even notices anything is wrong.
menagerieDialog: (It gently nuzzles you, which is quite discomforting considering it's a Bat.)
(It tries to nip at anyone who gets too close, including you. So moody!)
(Everett claims this creature can read, which cements your opinion that he is extremely weird.)
(It moves just a little too fast for your liking. It's unsettling.)
(It's fiddling with a piece of lint it stole from your pocket earlier.)
name: Mutated Crypt Bat
